titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide additional entitlement to Post-9/11 Educational Assistance to certain veterans and members of the Armed Forces who require extra time to complete remedial and deficiency courses, and for other purposes.
VET Extension Act
VET Extension Act
Veterans Education and Transfer Extension Act
Veterans Education and Transfer Extension Act
VET Extension Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
